author: cnbc.com
title: FL SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Foot Locker, Inc.
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether Foot Locker, Inc. (“Foot Locker” or the “Company”) (NYSE:FL) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/FL-Info-Request-Form-1855 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On August 18, 2017, the Company revealed negative financial results for the second quarter of fiscal year 2017, including revenue significantly below expectations, attributed in part to lower same-store sales. The Company also revealed that many more stores were being closed than previously announced, and that weaker sales were expected for the rest of the fiscal year.
To learn more about the investigation of Foot Locker contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/FL-Info-Request-Form-1855 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
